name: Draft Day Sports: Pro Basketball 2020
description: Draft Day Sports: Pro Basketball 2020 puts you in the role of general manager of your favorite professional basketball team. Every decision can be made by you from drafting, trading, signing free agents all the way to making each substitution to lead your team to championship glory and becoming a dynasty.

name: Isle of Dinosaurs 2D
description: You got teleported into a prehistoric world. It's time to show the inhabiting dinosaurs why you are not extinct and return back home.

name: Orb Rivals
description: Sci-fi football and jet-powered hockey collide in the intergalactic sport of Orb.

name: Lost Island:Battle Royale
description: this a battle royale game many players drop in an island to fight and the last one wins.

name: Ridiculous Bombing Game
description: Ridiculous Bombing Game, coming 2020. Get Your Mayhem Fix. Unleash the inner pyromanic and blow everything to smithereens. Or simply plant trees! Your choice, just saying.

name: Terminal Protocol
description: Turn-based tactics game inspired by XCOM series and set in a dystopian cyberpunk universe. Become a hacker - command your viruses in cyberspace battles and manually aim their weapons to perform precision shots and ricochets. Develop your malware, destroy corporate defences and reveal their secrets!

name: Cucumber Defense VR
description: Because of the abuse of fertilizer hormones, many mutant pests appeared on the planet, sweeping the whole planet of fruits and vegetables. And your vegetable garden will be their next goal. You now have the fate of the whole planet in your hands. grab up your weapons and protect the final fruits.

name: Thanks For Listening
description: "Thanks for Listening" is a short story-driven game that gives the player the chance to help four radio hosts with their lives.

name: Stratoscape
description: Stratoscape is a challenging and addictive stationary wave shooter exclusively for VR. Beat your high score as you blast waves of robots and creatures in this solo adventure campaign. Teleport through 8 unique levels, and enjoy some sick techno music on your journey! Just remember... don't look down!

name: Maska's Masks
description: The brother and sister that destiny joins, the illusion that emerges ceaselessly and weird masks...What is the true face of mysterious person maska after all? Here, players will explore dreams, illusions, absurdity and reality with Ayr.

name: Asylum of the Dead
description: Asylum of the Dead is a first person zombie shooting survival game.

name: Marburgh
description: Fight monsters, explore dungeons, craft weapons, save your village

name: La Mémoire
description: La Mémoire is a futuristic visual novel about longing and the struggle to bring back lost memories, set in a future where humans live alongside androids.

name: Kyber Knights
description: A multiplayer VR game by an Arcade for Arcades. Kyber Knights is a fun and easy multiplayer game developed exclusively for VR Arcades. Simple controls and an easy to control Operator View make this fast paced shooter a great choice for Arcades. CURRENTLY ONLY IN LAN.

name: Project IO
description: Project IO is a first-person, survival horror video game set in the late 1950's, with an emphasis on exploration and narrative.

name: Battle Dome Redux
description: Battle Dome is back, and better than ever! Battle Dome Redux focuses on the original game play elements of Battle Dome, refining and improving upon every aspect to give you the best Battle Dome experience. Battle Dome Redux is a 5 v 5 competitive Sci-Fi VR shooter.

name: Framing Dawes
description: Join Bay Dawes and her dead pet rabbit, Dink on their fairy-tale adventure to discover who is Framing Dawes. Talk to inanimate objects, time travel and cast spells while you explore the beautiful 2D hand-drawn world.

name: Uterine Supremacy
description: Uterine Supremacy is a 4 player local multiplayer game. Take control of the building blocks of life. To battle your friends through inspired mini games for the ultimate prize. Life itself. Inspired by true events.

name: One Gun 2: Stickman
description: Back in Stickland, lived-was Stickman. And he had a cat, whom he loved very much. They all did together, even bitcoins mined. But one day ... the cat was gone. And then stickman realized that the time had come and got a shotgun.

name: Igor Maks: The Meme Lord
description: A fascinating 2D space shooter based on memes. Set off an amazing journey with Igor Maks and reveal the secret of the universe!

name: MetaSpace
description: MetaSpace is a 2D action strategy game. Explore the ever-changing planets and stars to gather resources and items to bolster your strength and your crew. But be vigilant! As with every action you take time will pass and as you use it to grow in strength so do your enemies!

name: Zero Friction
description: This is a virtual reality hover car racing game, that is specifically developed for use with a racing wheel and pedals, but can also be played with an xbox controller or keyboard.

name: Wizardians: In Defence of Magic
description: Wizardians: In Defence of Magic is a multiplayer adventure card game with elements of RPG and resource management, created on the basis of innovative approach to collectible card games.

name: Lab 7: Cold Nights
description: In LAB 7: Cold Nights - wise foresight decides on the outcome of your fate. Wasted coins, reckless use of electricity, and poor time management will lead to your demise. Explore your surroundings, build defenses and find a way to freedom.

name: Bot Net: Ramshackle Robotics
description: "Build your bots, command your army, defeat the invaders!" 'Bot Net: Ramshackle Robotics' is a turn-based strategy rogue-like where you'll build an army of ramshackle robots to fight off an alien invasion!

name: Silicomrades
description: Silicomrades is a couch co-op shooter for two players about malfunctioning robots fighting against unstoppable bureaucracy. Build your own robots from parts providing different bonuses as well as potential defects. Fight the evil robo-politicians and fall apart but do not fall back!

name: Vega Motions: Project Unleashed
description: A 3rd person, 1 vs 1 skills-based fighting game set in a destructible arena.

name: Ghostball
description: You never know what skills can help you in your adventures. This time you should master your kicking talent! Kick the magic ball and clear the world from evil spirits.

name: Averon Rising
description: Averon is a futuristic empire building game that gives players agency to create and direct a nation in anyway they want to roleplay.

name: Suka's Escape
description: Suka Solvepuzzeler seems to only have two real talents in life, solving escape rooms and getting into ever more improbable situations. Relive some of his most daring escapes and most improbable circumstances using this ultra advanced software that will in no way ever turn against you.

name: AIM 3: War Protocol
description: "AIM: War Protocol" is a sequel to "AIM 2: Clan War". You are artificial mind that moves around the world using a hover. A huge world awaits you, full of dangers, quests, challenges. Communicate, fight, trade, explore!

name: Acid Knife
description: Battle Death Centipedes in the melting psychedelic void. Slower, more intentional side-scrolling combat, with an emphasis on positioning and improvisation.

name: Blood Scrolls
description: Eleven Fighters, Ten Blood Scrolls, and one throne at victory! Battle for your chance to become the new Sun God or the universe!

name: Lands of Pharaoh: Episode 1
description: Lands of Pharaoh is a multi-camera-angle based adventure game. The hero, Heragos, tries to get to Cairo in order to find the messages, related to his divine duty, left for him by Nefertiti.

name: Project Grove
description: Explore the weird and wonderful forest of Dacrima as aging alchemist Prof Edric Tayte, alongside your robot companion L-P1N! Forage for ingredients and brew potions to empower you with potent abilities. Uncover the secrets of the forest in this tale of two unlikely friends.

name: Traps Ahead!
description: A 2D platformer game. Try to avoid tricky obstacles and get the chest!

name: Mulite Sword Man
description: MULITE is a light action role-playing game that focuses on the collocating of operation and gameplay. The game provides a lot of equipment and skills. Based on the retro action role-playing game mechanism and combined with the Rogue-lite elements, this game abandons the traditional RPG lengthy dialogues and boring tasks, enabling players...

name: Exphelius: Arena
description: The Exphelius Championships are a long-standing series of ruthless arena fights between high-tech space vessels. Clever engineering paired with quick reflexes makes the deadly duo on the ladder. Only one person walks out alive. Are you up to the challenge?

name: Babel Climbers
description: A round-robin Roguelike game, with a lively rhythm and unique flavor. You were born in a tower, with a mission, climbing one level at a time of adventure, and like other climbers, you want to find the level of heaven. However, this is a bizarre world, which is an adventure that can not be turned back.

name: Road to Nowhere
description: Road To Nowhere tells the story of Cohle Bishop, an introvert and successful software developer whose life is torn to shreds by scandal. Confronted by his past and doubting his own sanity, he spirals into a depression on the open road, trying desperately to pull himself back from the brink.

name: Unlit
description: A slow-paced point-and-click adventure game without language. With original soundtrack, personally crafted models and textures and brilliant voice-acting, Unlit is completely a one-of-a-kind experience.

name: Skin Witch
description: Skin Witch is a true survival horror game, focused on managing limited resources, puzzles, and non-linear gameplay. Trapped in an underground mine you were sent to investigate, you soon learn you’re not alone. In the deep dark, depraved beasts stalk... and hunger.

name: Team Switch VR: Experts Burglary Agency
description: Team Switch is a virtual reality asynchronus co-op game, you are a robber assisted by your team, who can send you instructions to help you with a manual.

name: Disc Golf Adventure VR
description: Disc Golf in VR for when you can't (or don't want to) play outside!

name: The Looter
description: The Looter is 2D, action/adventure, pixel art, postapocalyptic indie game.

name: Iron Blood VR
description: Iron Blood VR is a sci-fi team shooter with various characters. Each character possesses unique weapons and skills. All the characters are able to communicate by teleporting to their allies, which makes the game insanely dynamic. By the way, teleportation beam is lethal to enemies.

name: Ten Thousand Coins: The Golden Merchant
description: Ten Thousand Coins: The Golden Merchant is a story-driven merchant adventure that will test your sense of strategy and empathy as you make tough decisions for a fox merchant girl aiming to save the life of a loved one.

name: Puzzle Patrol
description: Puzzle Patrol is a unique and modern spin on the falling blocks arcade puzzler, inspired by classics like Tetris, Puyo Puyo, and Puzzle League.

name: The Delirium Vacation
description: The Delirium Vacation is a surreal first person puzzle game from Ex Conspectu. Delve deep into the expanse of your own mind and experience the internal war between your inner Demons and your inner...hedgehogs.

name: Private Investigator Simulator
description: Assume the role of a modern detective and solve fascinating cases using lots of gadgets and your own skills. Let a sophisticated narrative help you uncover clues and secrets that might not be apparent right away and become a star detective.

name: Pick Your Poison
description: Pick a disadvantage each level, how far can you go in this roguelike?

name: Volleyball Fever Flat
description: Stick your feet in the sand and play beach volleyball on a tropical island. Volleyball Fever Flat is a sports game where you play 2v2 volleyball matches against computer-controlled opponents.

name: Time Travel Trainer
description: It's time for time travel! Master the complexities of fourth dimensional thinking to succeed in this indie 2d puzzle game.

name: After Gloom
description: A man enters the enigmatic Common Dream in search of a woman he once loved.

name: Heebie Jeebies: The Roller Coaster
description: Heebie Jeebies is a horror roller coaster game created especially for VR. To survive the whole ride, you will have to hold the handles in front of you. If at any point you will release them - GAME OVER. This is the perfect game for you to experience something spooky and to scare your friends as well.

name: Crazy city
description: This is a first person shooter game,The player is in a city full of enemies.Players are free to explore the surrounding area, Health must be guaranteed by evading or killing enemies,Players can use their own weapons or rob enemy weapons.

name: Arzt Simulator
description: Arzt Simulator - Nimm die Rolle eines Arztes ein und behandle erfolgreich Deine Patienten. Messe den Blutdruck, horche die Lunge ab, fertige Röntgenbilder an und vieles mehr. Stelle die richtige Diagnose und heile Deine Patienten mit der richtigen Therapie!

name: Phantom Hills
description: As the Paranormal Detective, Hudson Black, you explore an isolated town, trying to uncover the dark secrets of anomalies. Will you survive? Will you help, join or destroy the unknown forces? It is up to you, Detective.

name: WASDead: Complete Edition
description: You're indie developer that stucked in your undone game. You don't understand why you here... In the digital world. But you trying to find exit and alive. But there is one problem... The exit cost the money.

name: Oil Mogul
description: Experience the oil intoxication and become a successful oil entrepreneur in the 19th century in North America. Manage price fluctuations and sell oil or kerosene. While you earn money by digging up and selling oil, the city will grow with you.

name: Infinity Racer XD
description: Infinity Racer XD is designed to be a fast, simple to control and satisfying flight experience. Enjoy the simple and colorful atmosphere and master your reflexes. Infinity Racer XD fast, it's fun and it's awesome to kill time and to beat the high score.

name: Jian Wei Jun Wu
description: Love story with samurais living in Japan This is a splendid Japanese adventure game which its story is happened in "The Land of the Rising Sun" where human, Yōkai and Oni were living together.

name: Pirates on Deck VR
description: Get on board and travel the seven seas. Enemy pirates and dangerous monsters are all over your ship! Don’t let anyone stand in your way. Shoot with your guns or battle with your cutlass. Master the cannons with your commands and crush enemy ships.

name: Aery VR
description: Aery VR is a peaceful virtual reality exploration game from the perspective of a little bird who decided to discover the world. Calm down from the hassle of your daily life, experience the feeling of flying and immerse into beautiful and atmospheric landscapes.

name: Strike Mole
description: This is a 3D casual hamster game with 12 levels. The first four levels are training levels, which are relatively simple, and the subsequent levels will require you to complete more in a shorter period of time as the level increases. Mole strikes, you need to destroy them in a short time to unlock more levels.

name: Airhack
description: You are a secret Agent who begins work for the Airem as Hacker. Hacking servers of global corporations for profit, stealing data, manipulate the stock market, modify peoples academic or criminal records, laundering money, erasing evidence, framing innocent people. Do not trust anyone.

name: Cyberpunk Bar Sim
description:
This Cyberpunk-styled game is inspired by the gameplay of Game Dev Tycoon and the aesthetic of VA-11 HALL-A, sci-fi, and lo-fi city beats!

Own and manage a futuristic bar, meet quirky customers, market, and expand!

name: Warrior Spirit
description: A 3D adventure video game for all ages. Use Warrior Spirit's many tools and abilities such as the Four Arms, Bracelets of Good, and Clay for platforming, combat, exploring, and solving puzzles. Travel through various lands and defeat Evil by serving the will and power of Perfect Good.

name: My Super Defender: Battle Santa Edition
description: My Super Defender is a fun arcade game in a fantasy New Year's setting for Santa Claus, who will have to save the new year in a small kingdom!

name: Third Rule of Universe
description: Third Rule of Universe is a shoot'em up game with stylized visuals, a detailed story, dynamic gameplay, and fabulous music.

name: Consumed Awakening
description: Consumed Awakening is a strategic action game set in a dystopian future where mankind lives in a fading theocracy in the distant future among the stars.

name: The Cruxis Sword
description: An extra-terrestrial parasite has infected the planet and is causing its energy to become polluted. Follow our heroes as they partake on a journey to rid the planet of the darkness before its too late.

name: Robot Boy
description: Hi my name is RX-4, I am a robot, I can not control my body alone, try to help me go home please. Hmmmm ... I'm not going to hide it, I have no hope in you and I do not think you'll succeed. Already many people have tried to help me and have failed.

name: Mailbox
description: An arcade puzzle game for whole family! Drop the letter in the mailbox. Use the floor, buttons, teleports and moving platforms.

name: Into the Maze
description: A giant maze like structure is discovered on Mars. You are a veteran astronaut sent with his team of researchers to unravel its secrets. Traverse the giant maze and solve its puzzles using a small drone with an arsenal of upgradeable abilities.

name: The Zeta Orbital
description: The Zeta Orbital is a first-person exploration game. Explore an abandoned space station, hunting down clues to the crew's mysterious disappearance while scavenging the resources you need to survive and, just maybe, escape.

name: Mega Balls
description: Mega Balls is a game of precision and persistence as you attempt to save your pal Good Boi! Navigate your ball through levels with unique layouts and obstacles all while being pulled down by the force of gravity.

name: Klock
description: A fantasy adventure story featuring card battles (Trading Card Game in digital edition, only supporting Chinese now).

name: Choose for ME
description: Dive yourself in the Choose for ME universe and enter the reality of Mads Ever, a forgetful developer who will have to make his way through singular puzzles and some strange event due to his past...

name: Cross Border VR
description: "Cross Border VR" is a VR Shooting game. In the game, you need to eliminate the remaining forces of armed elements in the border areas and regain the treasure!

name: Astro Puppa
description: Destroy all asteroids and your self esteem! Prove that you are not a Noob reaching the perfect score of 8888! 8===> A tough game for tough gamers!

name: Escape from the Lostmoon
description: Cosmic pilot has lost his ship on the remote asteroid populated by disaster human colony, where outbreak of the unknown virus took place. Hungry zombies, villainous mercenaries and monsters are everywhere. Only you ... and his awesome arsenal could lead hero to freedom.

name: Blade Attack
description: After a lot of time polishing and great discussion with art, it was born. It is not only a game that requires your patience to study, it is more like my child, with that kind of emotion, going and You are strangers to meet, I hope that you can become good friends, and bring it together in this nervous, exciting and refreshing world!

name: Cirrata
description: Cirrata is a Metroidvania style indie video game about Keir, an anthropomorphic red panda who also happens to be a chef. The game is. inspired by the popular console games of the 90's. ​ Fight waves of enemies and improve your reputation in town to grow the town's pub.

name: Through the Unknown
description: Through The Unknown is a 3D platformer where you try to survive deadly environments as a little jelly cube. Play through a courageous story mode and unlock new features for the level editor, where you can create your own courses to play.

name: Heavens Tournament
description: If you love anime, fighting and Virtual Reality or looking for a fun workout, then this is the game for you!

name: Labirint
description: Imagine a labyrinth where walls move every time the player moves making it impossible to calculate your way to the goal in advance so you'll have to improvise.

name: Carnival Hunt
description: Carnival Hunt is a Multiplayer Social Horror Game where you can either fight against the cannibalism corrupting the world or embrace it. Will you be the first one to commit cannibalism for survival or test your instinct at trust?

name: PlayBound
description: PlayBound tells the story of Kelvin, a boy whose parents have become fatally boring. Strap on your velcro light-up kicks and equip your POG slammers, because it's time to save the world from certain lameness!

name: The VR Canyon
description: The VR Canyon is a canyoning simulation mixed with climbing. - Explore the beautiful canyon in a playful way.

name: Lazr: A Clothformer
description: A new era of physics based platforming is about to begin. Play as fusion powered killer android Lazr, facing off against rogue AI and mega-corporations in Alpha City One.

name: Squillamorph
description: Squillamorph is a challenging action-platformer set in a mysterious mechanical world. Pursued by hordes of brutal enemies, you must use your parasitic ability to 'infest' and take control of them. Fight back, survive, and you might just discover your purpose.

name: I Will Be Your Eyes
description: Two or more players work together to lead a blinded Captive out of a maze of death. Work against the clock as you avoid traps like walls of spikes, bottomless pits, and smashing hammers!

name: Origin
description: You wake up in a mysterious dark underwater facility with abilities you can't explain, for some reason you can slow time and distort gravity, you also seem to be able to run faster than normal people, did they experiment on you?

name: Taro: a fluffy visual novel
description: A soft Visual Novel set in a world of cats, Taro is the story of a soft cat who recently moved to the city and found himself facing serious bullying problems.

name: Twinora
description: Twinora is an anime-styled RPG where you clear dungeons, face unique monsters, and collect items to get stronger! Prepare to find treasure and learn new abilities throughout your journey with your best friend.

name: Komori Fruit Rush
description: Komori is a Hyper-Casual object/fruit catching game with a few twists from the norm. It sets out to challenge all ages and will be able to challenge some of the most skilled individuals in their quest to be and stay the best.

name: Project D: Human Risen
description: You are the last selected humans to join Project D to prevent human extinction, you survive, build civilization, explore and find the cause of humans will become extinct.

name: Super Angling
description: Super Angling is a game focused on the classic pastime of fishing. Explore the open world looking to discover all of the species. On a raft, boat, or offshore, join in, relax and drop a line.

name: Lapso
description: Lapso is a single player first-person exploration game, with particular attention paid to the environmental narrative and sound. It develops through the figure of a scientific illustrator camping near a lake, documenting a special assignment.

name: Dangerous Blaster
description: Run, roll and shoot as long as possible through an arena filled with aliens and dangerous obstacles. Be careful, every missed shot becomes a new threat ! Great little game to practice and warm-up.

name: Music Club Manager
description: Music Club Manager is a game where you play the role of the owner and manager of a music club. Buy equipment, sound system, lighting and decide on the appearance of your club. Make money on party people and have fun with them!

name: Evolution Battle Simulator
description: Evolution Battle Simulator is a funny semi-physics-based tactics game. where simulation-based battles let the battles live. Experience the greatest battles of evolution in history.

name: Pumpkin Breaker
description: A Halloween themed rethinking of a classic game mechanic. Smash those pumpkins and defeat the spooky bosses to collect as much candy as you can!

name: The Airship Designer
description: Build your own airships by snaping engines, envelops, fins and gondolas together. Then fly it freely or watch it blow up in the sandbox!

name: Planet Modular Tower Defense. Sci-Fi TD Strategy
description: Tower defense offline game with many defense strategies.

name: I am Your Principal
description: Do you see that old guy shouting and screaming? that's you the principal Being a Principal is not an easy task. you can be the meanest, sourest principal in history or not.

name: Ray Eager
description: Survive in a big and dangerous world! This world will be even more dangerous if you appear in it! Kill everyone you see! Rob! Break the laws! Organize your clan to seize power in the game and control every step of your citizens and collect taxes. Everyone wants to rule, try to sit on your throne!

name: Peer Gynt the Game
description: Norwegian dramatist Henrik Ibsen's undying play Peer Gynt has been recreated as an interactive game for children. The game takes you through the adventures of Norwegian peasant and anti-hero Peer. A new way to experience Ibsen's tale is here.

name: Mass Plus
description: Mass Plus takes advantage of VR to provide an arcade style experience for both casual and competitive players. Compete for the top ranking of each level or take your time and enjoy the visuals, the choice is yours!

name: Non-Compliant
description: Non-Compliant is a cyberpunk platformer in virtual reality, where you wake up in a garbage incinerator without information of your environment. You’ll need to explore this new world and discover what you are, where you are and find a way to survive.

name: Space Shapes
description: Space Shapes is the finest retro arcade-style score chasing action game. Build your skill and command your ship to survive the onslaught of shapes that are threatening to destroy the galaxy.

name: RPG Driver
description: Driver simulator of different cars with a role component. Level up your skills to be a more dexterous driver or businessman, explore a world full of funny jokes and meetings with aliens.

name: Into the Soup
description: A portal to another dimension. A world abandoned.Journey into the Soup and uncover the mysteries of a strange new reality in this atmospheric first-person puzzle adventure game.

name: Grave Tower
description: Grave Tower is a "rogue-lite" tactical RPG. Choose your adventurer, climb the tower and fight off monsters while building your team. Recruit defeated enemies or sacrifice them for their abilities. No single run is the same.

name: Waxworks: Curse of the Ancestors
description: Take the ultimate quest and discover the secret of the Waxworks! Embark on the fight of your life as vicious creatures, and mutants are ready to rip you apart. This gory horror game has no mercy and dares you to enter its ghastly world. Will you rise to the challenge or die trying?

name: Paralives
description: You live and then you die. But at least do it in a nice house! Paralives is an upcoming life simulation indie game. Build your dream house, create some characters and manage their lives the way you want!

name: E-Ball
description: E-ball is an isometric platform game where players will have to guide their E-ball towards the finish line while collecting valuable orbs and beating the clock. Race through 4 zones and 20 stages of palm sweating challenges from spiked pits of doom to fire spitting totems!

name: Billy
description: Take control of Billy and Polly as you make your way through a colorful and challenging world full of precision platforming goodness.

name: Overflo Game
description: Overflo Game is a 2D platformer with responsive and fluid movement, challenging game play that feature physics puzzles, melee combat, boss fights, enemy encounters, destructible environments and more. Fully voice acted dialog and a humorous and captivating story line.

name: Banter Schooldays!!
description: Banter Schooldays!! is a visual novel legal drama adventure game developed by the independent team Lingtan Studio.

name: Global Aviation Dream
description: In Global Aviation Dream,you can build up your own airline company at any airport of this world. You can purchase or rent airliner,build up and manage your own airliner fleet,make your airliner's flight plan,operate your base hub,complete your route network,offer the best aviation transportation service for passengers and cargo owners...

name: DNA
description: DNA is a top down shooter mixing: combat, survival and exploration in an apocalyptic open world with pixel art and minimalist design.

name: Contract Work
description: Contract Work is a 2d sneak & shoot roguelike in a cyberpunk universe. Break into corporate monoliths, evade security, then steal and destroy corporate assets to equip your hi-tech mercenary freelancer!

name: Meiro
description: Meiro: A Science-Fantasy Maze Survival Game Play co-op or competitively to solve the mystery of the maze.

name: Drill Man Rumble
description: Drill Man Rumble is a Drill-tastic party game that pits drill wielding warriors in a battle for supremacy! Master a wide variety of drills and compete across danger filled arenas but never forget, one hit and you’re DONE!

name: Ortolan
description: Dodge & Slash & Bang by a Cute Little Girl.

name: Real Arcade Bike
description: Real Arcade Bike is an Arcade style bike game which is about reaching the goal without crashing and breaking the highscore with a new record time. Inspired by several arcade classics the game features a unique low poly art style.

name: Deathopolis
description: Deathopolis is an arcade style fast paced shooter. Take on a series of rooms collecting prizes and clearing out waves of enemies using guns and power-up abilities.

name: Tech vs Magic
description: Tech vs Magic is an action FPS where radically different enemies vie to control the fate of the world. Magical forces have erupted forth into our world, and threaten to replace our reality with one of their making.

name: Doka:Origins
description: Doka-a kind of small adventure lasting one life.

name: Earthbreakers
description: Satellites rain death as factions fight for control of a Broken Earth. Protect your team's harvesters, build factories and vehicles, and assault the enemy base. It's team FPS action in an RTS world!

name: Other Side
description:
Don't worry, we'll all meet to the other side! 
 
Arrows to move, space or enter to use the stones. 
 
Made for the Ludum Dare 30

name: File
description:
Raven is just a regular, young woman. She goes to work, she goes to sleep, she checks her e-mails… In fact, there's nothing special about her. She's just ordinary. 
 
If she's so uninteresting then why was she targeted by an entity calling itself 'File'? 
 
Part desktop simulator, part platformer, this is a game designed in 2.5 months for #PixelHorrorJam by myself & James_T_Ripper 
 
Inspired by the popular titles Welcome To The Game & Pony Island, File requires the mouse to be controlled in order to maneuver Raven's computer in search of a set of programs, each more horrifying as you progress. 
 
Controls: 
-Once a program is executed, the D/Right-Arrow Keys can be used to move the player right 
-Alternatively, the A/Left-Arrow Keys can be used to move the player left 
Like most platformers, the Spacebar is used for jumping in levels which require it

name: Pequod
description:
A procedurally generated action game about a whale named Mobias trying to survive the onslaught of an obsessive captain named Ahab. Obtain items and add ons that make your whale more powerful. Fight through the waves of enemy ships, subs and airships until you are able to face Ahab's ship the Pequod. 
 
Features 
 
-5 different races with over 100 Enemies and Bosses 
-Lots of different items and weapons 
-A RPG stat system that includes Damage, Magic Damage, Luck, Speed and Madness 
-Shops, traps, sacrifice alters and more

name: I Like Walking Very Much
description:
I Like Walking Very Much is a textless 2D walking-simulator. Play as a strange spider who loves walking very much.

The game will be end in 30 minutes more or less, very easy control, There are no hidden items or achievements. It's very tiny game.

This game inspired by some my experiences in social life. Hate incites a desire for recognition, and it starts to make another hate.

Arts, codes sounds and tracks by camel504

Beautiful "Amatic Bold" font by Vernon Adams

name: Armies of Riddle E.X. (Extreme)
description: Armies of Riddle EX (Extreme) is a Fantasy RPG MOBA game featuring the first of its kind in game strategy mode.

name: Avoidon
description: Fly and avoid obstacles. Survive as long as you can!

name: Project Z
description: After waking up in a zombie infested hospital you have no idea why you are there and how you got there and all you want is get out...

name: Graularm
description: Large sofa, TV. And, two people.

name: Blind Justice
description: Near the border of the iron curtain in the soviet union lies a small village where unrest is brewing and supplies are scarce. You and your family have been sent there to bring order, where you will serve the USSR as a judge. Balance your own moral judgment with the opinions of those watching...

name: Star of Lemutia: Reborn
description: This is a hardcore, real-time , tactical game where you will operate two legions at the same time, each containing a powerful hero and four well-trained mercenaries. They will work together under your control to maximize their abilities in order to defeat powerful enemies.

name: Lootcraft
description: Stop the encroaching chaos and restore elemental balance to the world, Lootcraft is an action RPG platformer focused on fantasy loot and fun combat.

name: Spy DNA
description: Spy DNA is a combat simulation RPG that lets you lead a squad of genetically enhanced agents on the trail of organized crime and international intrigue.

name: Geno the Fallen King
description: A 2d platformer with bright environments and fastpaced action. Use Geno's plasma to blast enemies into thin air on your way to save your brother! Play your way through the story mode and 2 extra game modes!

name: Arc Vector
description: Pilot a stolen alien ship in a rebellion against the Archronite invasion. Fly across the archipelagos of your home world and capture enemy bases with the help of your navigation droid co-pilot, DFX-9T. Battle against enemy Arc Vectors, Fighters, Drones and Laser Tanks, liberate your planet, Melos.

name: Noxiam: Miserable Sinners
description: Run away. From this spooky mansion.

name: Golf on the Moon
description: "Houston, we have a hole in one!" You've been sent to the moon to conduct scientific mini-golf experiments. This is important work considering the gravity of the situation... It's one small putt for the moon, one giant leap for moonkind!

name: The Sphere of Abyss
description: "The Sphere of Abyss" is a game that combines action, shooting, exploration, adventure with RPG & Roguelike elements. Faced with the challenges from the abyss, whether you choose to move carefully or dash forward, your strength and luck will be tested in The Sphere of Abyss!

name: PM-1 Inverse Universe
description: Top-down science fiction space shooter game with story inserted into dark space of universe.

name: The Clouds Travel Notes
description: The Clouds Travel Notes is an action role-playing game where players will play a journey from the early entry into the northern border to tracing the culprit behind the massacre and the adventure between the government and the cult.

name: Thigh Climbers
description: Play as some of the world's best thigh climbers who have mastered the art of squeezing metal poles between their legs and launching themselves higher into the air. Compete against others who have mastered this niche technique, and see who is truly the best thigh climber in the world!

name: Oxyd
description: A unique mix of brain teaser and action puzzler, Oxyd® is an award winning classic computer game originally created in 1989. After 30 years we are proud to present a redesigned version.

name: Beautiful elves
description: A classic puzzle game that will cheer you up!

name: Broken Core
description:
Broken core is a PC Windows indie videogame developed by Oscar Celestini. 
It's a new game with retrogame taste. 
Do you loved Turrican or Megaman? Add tits and that's it! 
Playing the Story mode you'll see lots of illustrations between stages. 
 
More than 30 playable levels and the Survival mode available in this complete version. 
 
Playable with keyboard, J2k works fine for a pad custom configuration.

name: Astro Rider
description:
A classic shooter (horizontal scroll) created in pixel art, with a great nostalgic feeling. 
 
Gala is a space rider and she's got an only mission: Save the world from the robot invasion. 
 
In this nice game (with a fantastic retro-game taste) you'll have power ups that will increase your power, you'll have the ability to enhance your level (and upgrade your spacebike in 3 different models) playing in more than 25 stages. You'll be good enough to reach the final boss and defeat him?

name: HorseGame
description: HorseGame is an upcoming action/adventure style game, based on small horses. Use its unique magical combat system to fight your way through hordes of enemies while exploring the exotic levels!

name: Junk on Wheels
description: Junk on Wheels is a demolition-derby style multiplayer racing game with weapon pickups. The race course is broken up into stages, where each racer tries to eliminate or outrun the others, scoring points used to determine the overall winner.

name: Battleships and Carriers: Pacific War
description: Casual turn-based WW2 Pacific naval strategy: move, search & destroy, build units and develop technologies. Clear and simple combat and move. Pixel perfect, 2D, retro style, WW2. Easy to learn - hard to master.

name: The Disgusting Slaughterman
description: The Disgusting Slaughterman is a high-adrenaline single-play and 4-player co-operative arcade-action FPS. Be a villain and fight against the happiness!

name: Project BBQ
description:
Project BBQ was the development title for a 3D Action MMORPG in the Dungeon Fighter universe, first revealed at the 2018 Dungeon&Fighter Festival in Korea.

The game's story diverges from the events of Dungeon Fighter Online, changing key events along with the fates of characters and bosses.

The team behind Project BBQ have reworked parts of it into a new souls-like console game under the title Arad Chronicle: Kazan, revealed previously as Project AK.
While Project Overkill, the other 3D Action MMORPG D&F game, may have received some related assets from Project BBQ as well.

name: Trip the Ark Fantastic
description: Trip the Ark Fantastic is a 2D story-driven adventure set in the Animal Kingdom, a fable world filled with alluring vistas, colorful characters and, unexpectedly, scholarly debates.

name: Evil behind the shadows
description: This is a fantasy mystery adventure rpg in which you have been stuck in a parallel universe in which you have to exit

name: Godstruction
description: A long ago, mortals waged war against the gods and managed to defeat them. Now, the player as the only celestial being alive has to bring mortals to extinction in turn-based battles in order to survive.

name: Slender: Anxiety
description:
He will find you sooner or later

Slender: Anxiety is a short experimental horror game created by Hades Productions developed through the Unity3D engine. This game is based off Slender: The Arrival made by Blue Isle Studios and Parsec Productions.

name: For Inco
description: This is a RPG game that grows through killing monsters to raise levels and create various items.

name: BreakTube
description: Do you want to take out your aggressions after a hard work day or school? if yes, this is the game for you. You basically play "Rage room" but with a twist that you need to managing a YouTube channel for earning money for the sake of keeping breaking things.

name: Captain Cook: Word Puzzle
description: A word puzzle game with a catchy gameplay mechanism and hundreds of levels to play!

name: Joel Mayer's Purgatory
description: Help Alex to save her friends before they succumb to the flames of hell and uncover the shocking truth about a family, their mansion and the Purgatory in this stylish horror adventure game.

name: Origami Ninja Star
description: Origami Ninja Star is a chaotic hybrid of fast paced action and physics-based combat where YOU are the weapon. Slice into a colourful paper world where everyone is folded differently, and your destiny is to destroy everyone in your way.

name: Xenociders
description: Hide, hunt and be hunted in a tense survival action VR shooter set on a lush planet ruled by ferocious Xenosaurs.

name: Laser Arena Online
description: Laser Arena Online is a VR FPS. Each player has two laser cannons which are used to shoot the enemies and to move around. Improve your movement skills and become a pro player.

name: History Warriors
description: Eight historic figures, together for the first time, combined in an exciting 2D Fighter.

name: Our Homeland
description: In memory of our Homeland's anniversary!

name: Friends for the Apocalypse
description: Inspired by games like Smash TV and UBERMOSH. FFTA is a top-down action arena zombie survival base defense game. Control both man and dog as you work together to survive on a zombie infested procedural island.

name: Language Worm
description: Learn foreign language vocabulary while playing an arcade game. Supports Spanish, French, German, and Latin vocabulary. Study anywhere from the most common fifty words up to the most common one thousand words.

name: One Incident In A Small Town
Technojuice
description: Welcome To The Stars. Technojuice is a story-based Action RPG made by one person. Grab your 'Tapeman' Cassette Player and set off on a comic-styled adventure across the Galaxy.

name: What's Left
description: What's Left is a classic Zelda-styled action/adventure game where you, the player, must guide Landon and his shapeshifting pal, Picaro, through a haunted world. The story spans several years and a variety of locations that require utilizing items, characters and the environment.

name: Law of Life
description: " Natural selection, survival of the fittest, survival of the fittest " This is the law of life that nature cannot escape, the conquest of the inferior by the dominant race!《Law of Life》 is a game of creature-oriented, unlocked combat. Even you can kill creatures just by feeling.

name: Within
description: This is our ❤️ letter to the emerging art form of Cinematic VR. Within offers a library of beautiful immersive stories — award-winning VR documentaries, animation, music videos, horror, and more.

name: The Book of Yorle
description: The Book Of Yorle is an action-packed adventure game. You must explore, solve puzzles, avoid traps, and more to restore the church of the Holy Yorle, and free the kingdom. Find items to help you on your journey. Free prisoners, smash walls and doors, and kill the Evil Ones as you travel the kingdom.

name: House Flipper City
description: House Flipper City gives you a unique chance to create your own real estate business. Buy devastated flats, houses and commercial premises all around the city. Renovate the acquired property, but first, look around and redesign the apartments so that they meet the requirements of future customers.

name: Unlimited Heart
description: "Unlimited Heart" is a dream turn-based online game. The game has a classic mythical world view, a dreamy and fresh national style picture, a beautiful and beautiful appearance, Q cute cool mounts, and can also be confused with all the gods and goddesses. The edge!

name: Grand Theft Auto: Underground
description:
This mod focuses on implementing the old 3D era maps and combining them together on the San Andreas engine. This includes maps from GTA: III, GTA: Vice City, Manhunt, Manhunt 2, Bully, and of course GTA: San Andreas itself. Not only are we adding the maps, we are also trying to implement the features these games have as well. This includes hardware shops, vehicles, peds, weapons, and other content.

Everything is done in the same style as how San Andreas is.

name: Zombie Horde
description: Your city is full of zombies and you need to dodge or attack the undead while exploring the surrounding area. Keep your health as long as possible while trying to escape this hell in this first-person shooter.

name: Biomagnet
description: Walk around the ceiling and escape from the building.

name: NightStar
description: "NightStar" is an independent and fictional work with the dynamic world and the feelings of the homeland.

name: GlaiveZ
description: Enter the Tower of Peril and Glaive your way to ascension! Wield two kinetic blades to skirmish the dark enemy, their menacing machines, and confront the Ultimate Darkness.

name: Mini Royale: Nations
description: Mini Royale: Nations (MRN) is an open-economy FPS meets land strategy game with different PvP and PvE game modes for every type of player. The core shooter game is set on top of a land control-oriented, social strategy game with a deep emphasis on clans, alliances and social mechanics. The game economy rewards social behavior, and is designed to be an endless experience built by and for the player community.

name: NFL 98
description: NFL 98 (also known as NFL Prime Time 98) is a sports video game released for the Sega Genesis in 1997. Based on the National Football League, the game was a follow up to Sega's only football video game for the Sega Saturn, NFL '97. It is the last game in Sega's original Joe Montana/NFL series, which would be succeeded by NFL 2K.

name: Rugby Manager
description:
Become a rugby manager and lead your team to victory!
Create your own rugby club, train your players, prepare the best strategy and win the championship. Play against your friends or other players in many competitions and show off your management skills!

name: Pongis Run
description: Pongis Run is a simple time-killing game for your utter enjoyment. Run around and try to eat as many gold blobs to gain points. But you're not alone. Your bot opponent will try to eat gold blobs before you can. Special power blobs give you superpowers. You can get super fast or super-size yourself, shrink, temporarily blind or freeze your opponent. There are infinite levels for you to play. With every level you unlock, your opponent gets smarter and quicker.

name: F1 Mobile Racing
description:
Develop and customise your own F1 car from the ground up, race for one of the 10 official F1 teams, and challenge opponents from around the world to thrilling multiplayer Duels.
Featuring all the official teams and drivers of the 2022 Formula 1 season, F1 Mobile Racing lets you compete on stunning circuits from this season against the greatest drivers on the planet, such as Lewis Hamilton, Max Verstappen, Charles Leclerc and Fernando Alonso.

name: Spades Plus
description:
Let’s join the LARGEST SPADES COMMUNITY in the world to play with millions of online players!

Spades Plus offers you a great experience against many Spades players from all around the world! You can play in many different game modes such as Classic, Solo, Mirror and Whiz.

Now playing Spades is much better with Tournaments, Knock-Out and many other different modes!

Spades is one of the traditional trick-taking card games like Bid Whist, Hearts, Euchre & Canasta, but this game is played in pairs in which spades is always the trump.

name: Empire Live
description: Empire Live is a Real-Time Strategy Game focused on online matches where you will have to prosper your empire and fight your opponent with your magical power and your army to lead your people to the total domination!

name: Rumble League
description: Rumble League is a thrilling new team-based shooter you can play with friends or anyone else all around the world. Every match is an intense multiplayer showdown, pitting a diverse cast of Superstars against each other in an epic, globe-spanning tournament

name: Crey
description: Play a wide variety of community-made games, from shooters to platformers to puzzle games -- or make your own with our easy-to-use, no-coding editor.

name: Bloble.io
description:
Bloble.io is aTower Defense Online Game.

Build a fortress and defend it using as many weapons and soldiers as you can get. As you make progress, you'll be able to upgrade your defenses -- protect the main tower by building a wall and get ready to invade enemy areas!

name: Aye Fair Lady
description:
It's Mandatory Singing Day in an otherwise sleepy Yorkshire town. This will not end well. 
 
This is a point and click adventure, and also a musical. Won 1st place in the community voting for Adventure Jam 2018 as well as a Judge's Pick prize.  
 
Largely considered the best musical point and click adventure set in Yorkshire with robots in it ever made.

name: Commissar's Contrapasso
description: A hand drawn adventure about the redemption of a Russian officer

name: Pongis Jump
description: Jump over canyons and rocks at an ever increasing speed.

name: Wraith
description:
During a 3-day workshop in Australia, a girl named Kana discovers a dark secret hidden beneath the manor she is staying at. Now she must work against time to save her friends from a fate worse than death. There are two objectives: Solve the mystery behind the existence of the wraith, and live to see the morning sun. Dawn is only a few hours away...

Wraith is a freeware game made in 2005 by Neo Kuriyo, or Neok as he is known on the RPGmaker.net forums. It's a horror-based Adventure Game made with RPG Maker 2003, and was Neok's first game on the site.

name: Antiny
description:
A game where you shoot things and enter caves.
And beat whoever gets in your way.

name: Sniper and Spotter Climbing a Tower
Aëdemphia
description:
Aëdemphia is a French game and a cross between the western RPG inspired by the traditional role-playing game and the J-RPG. You to play as Irzyka, a young woman traveling between worlds, through a story whose outcome you will determine entirely by your choices.

Spread over several hours of gameplay and offering many side quests, the latest demo, available on this site, gives a good overview of what the final game will be.

name: Fail to Win
description: Abuse the game's quirks to progress through sophisticated slapstick deathtrap puzzles, uncovering the secrets of a world going through an identity crisis.

name: Unannounced Survival Game
description:
Unannounced Survival Game is the working title of Blizzard's brand-new survival game for PC and console. A place full of heroes we have yet to meet, stories yet to be told, and adventures yet to be lived. A vast realm of possibility, waiting to be explored.

The game was announced on 25 January 2022. It was cancelled exactly 2 years later on 25 January 2024.

name: Full Moon
description: Explore a pyramid full of misteries while fighting against the dark forces. Chain your attacks in a fast paced combat system full of stylish combo. Fuse and equip the skills you find to forge your own path.

name: Stream Raiders
description:
Stream Raiders is a streamer-led community battle game where streamers play live with their viewers on Twitch!

The game can be played both as a main game or as a side game alongside the streamers main content with battles taking place every 30 minutes. The streamer is the “Captain” and their viewers make up the army. Progress through campaign maps together to collect rewards, unlock new units, and level-up your army!

name: Battle of Titans
description: Battle of Titans is a free, 3rd person mech shooter game developed by Red Button LLC. Battle of Titans has been fully launched for iOS and Android. The goal of the game is to purchase Titans, equip them with Weapons and Backpacks and head into battle to destroy enemy Titans and achieve victory.

name: Storm Rider
description: Experience super-fast motorbike racing like never before. Choose from 10 bikes and then take on Storm Riders 11 tracks based in 3 major location; Harbour, Forest and the Old Flight Facility. Step on to Storm Rider and unleash the speed!

name: Breaworlds
description: Breaworlds is a free to play multiplayer MMO sandbox game where you can build awesome worlds with your friends, grow hundreds of awesome items on trees, customize your character's style, collect gems and spend them in the Breaworlds store.

name: Daikoukai Jidai III: Costa del Sol
Kouchuuouja Mushiking: Atsumete Asobou Kabutomushi Zukan
Kouchuuouja Mushiking: Greatest Champion e no Michi 2
Blockiverse
description: Blockiverse is a game in a vast and open universe, in which you can get creative, explore new things and have a good time, either alone or with friends.

name: Dog-O
description: Jellybean is lost in a strange world beneath the surface, and Pleasant and Tom must find him and bring him home.

name: Fragment
description:
Follow Rose Ilya on her quest to the Fountain of Life. Down the abandoned mines she'll encounter many strange creatures. They were once people who mined for Crystal Fragments, but the toxic air turned them into blood thirsty monsters.

Your ammo is limited so use your bullets wisely. Collect as many Fragments as you can, and reach for the Fountain!

Features:

English Voice Acting and Subtitles
Interactive Tutorials
Xbox 360 Controller Compatibility with Heart Pounding Rumble!

name: Doggest Dungeon
description:
A very basic prototype of a Darkest Dungeon parody game.
Made for the Lartu's Mini-rpg One Week Jam.

name: Police Force
description:
Respond to the most deadliest 911 calls! 
 
Police Force is a hybrid horror FPS game that pits you, a police officer, in the most horrifying and deadliest situations you can imagine. Collect evidence, save hostages, and do whatever it takes to bring bloodthirsty criminals to justice.

name: Crop Dusta
description: Crop Dusta is a fast-paced Puzzle Action game. You control the crop duster by maneuvering it to spray crops and bugs while dodging buildings, trees, and animals. Please the farmers by spraying crops to pass to the next field. Spray those bugs before they eat the crops! Do you have what it takes to be an Ace Crop Dusta pilot?

name: Path of Exile Mobile
description:
A mobile iteration of Path of Exile currently in development. 
 
"...an experimental version of Path of Exile for mobile devices. Path of Exile's Atlas Map system is actually perfect for bite-sized action gameplay. This is a complete Path of Exile game experience with no pay-to-win elements and is being developed in-house at Grinding Gear Games." 
 
The game's demo, shown at Exilecon 2019, has a gameplay loop based on the endgame map system used in Path of Exile with smaller maps for quick gameplay sessions. 
The UI was redone with the health and mana orbs being combined in one corner, 4 skills shown in one corner with 4 more available from a touch and swipe menu. 
Skills in the game use the planned 4.0 system with a separate menu screen for active gems that can have up to 4 gem sockets.  
Inventory was redesigned with equipment, currency items and maps split to different inventory menus automatically when picked up and items can be picked up anywhere on screen.

name: Fault & Fragment
description: Fault & Fragment is a game about exploring the ghost of a world, searching for a way to lay it to rest. Travel far, contend with terrible foes, and reignite the leylines that once powered your kingdom.

name: Rain of Fire
description: Rain of Fire is a game that puts 10 players in a Free-for-All match to protect their people from missiles. Eliminate enemies and gather money by day.Move your people from dangerous positions by night.Protect as many houses as possible for your people and be the last one standing.

name: I'm Keyboardman
description: 我，是一名键盘侠 我一直觉得，这个世界需要批判，需要改变 而我，是那唯一可以改变这一切的天命之子 是的，就是现在，就用我的键盘 拯救这虚伪、愚蠢、浮夸、残忍的世界吧！

name: Space Road
description: On the way to a new Galaxy! In Space Road get on board your spaceship and get all the stars!

name: Miniverse Wars
description: Miniverse Wars is a survival real-time strategy game. In order to survive you will need to build a strong defence system to resist the constant waves of enemies and deal with unforeseen events.

name: Stratos
description: Stratos is a casual simulation game set in the sky! Build a flying ship to visit different islands, engage in combat, trade with merchants, and manage your citizens.

name: Deep Space Waifu: Legends
description: We select the most played girls of the franchise and redone the TOP 10 best, in new poses and double clothing! Revisit all the classics with Bear King in this nostalgic adventure!

name: The Chains That Bound Me
description: Arridaios discovers that his friend went missing. And along the way in finding him, he sees something he dreads. Something he never wants to see again. Far worse than the oppression of King Leuric.

name: Realm Lands
description: Realm Land's is a 2D RPG survival game. The game will have many features, including a completely randomly generated 250x250 realm. The realm will have a chance to spawn randomly generated groups of either monster camps, chests, dungeons, bosses, and resources for you to explore and collect.

name: Predator VR
description: Look for Predator VR exclusively in VR arcades. Predator VR drops you into the explosive action of the 1980’s blockbuster movie in the ultimate VR showdown between an overpowering Alien hunter and an elite soldier. Multiplayer, Soldier Campaign and Predator Rampage modes.

name: Medieval - Embers of War
description: Medieval - Embers of War is a side scroller fighting game. The game offers a fast paced, casual gameplay that puts players in a fantasy world where the land is being torn apart by conflict. Players will take on adventures, epic rivals and control of their own castle.

name: Magicians Legacy
description: Magicians Legacy is a classic turn-based fantasy strategy. Defeat countless enemies to solve the mysteries of fading magic and bring life back to the kingdom of dwarves.

name: Warbrush
description: Warbrush is a local-multiplayer tank brawler where the tanks are imagined as "paintbrushes" fighting a war over canvases, with each tank having a different style of brushstroke. As the fight goes on, the players will leave behind a beautiful mess commemorating their violent engagement.

name: Cybermonk
description: Cybermonk is a competitive laser puzzler in which clans of cyborg monks compete in a deadly ritual

name: Snow Mercy
description: Snow Mercy is a competitive TPS/Strategy Party game, where you play as a snowmen brought to life with the magic of winter. Build up your army, and prove to all snowman-kind that your team's hat is, in fact, the BEST with escalating snowball warfare.

name: Moero!! Pro Yaguu: Home Run Kyousou
Vritra
description:
Throw down a challenge to all the 80s and 90s gamers. Get back the enthusiasm you had once!
Control the dragon and the vajras, and destroy the evil Dragon Emperor "VRITRA"!
Awesome graphics, powerful sound effects and amazing controls.
This ultimate 2D shooter is a step forward in the history of the shooting games!

name: Plan 8
description: I don't know where I am or why the pistol feels so familiar in my hand. But the note in my pocket tells me what to do next.

name: Everwild
description: Inspired by the beauty of the natural world around us, Everwild is a brand-new game in development from Rare where unique and unforgettable experiences await in a natural and magical world. Play as an Eternal as you explore and build bonds with the world around you.

name: AngerForce: Strikers
description:
The Industrial Revolution started. Machinery intelligence evolved.
Some evil AI machinery started a war to all human beings. The wind of war swept the world quickly. The AI machinery army call themselves “Anger Force”, and claim to be new lords of this planet…

name: Happy Color
description: Discover Happy Color: a calming colour by numbers game. With relaxing digital art, exclusive nature, fashion, Disney, Marvel art games and much more - Happy Color is the colouring game you need, whether you’re looking for a fun, creative moment or for an antistress app that will help with anxiety relief.

name: Red Frost
description: Red Frost is a story-driven, first person perspective, post-apocalyptic survival adventure set in the rough winter climates of last century's Russia.

name: Act 1
description:
A game about a guy who migrated to Japan to become a NEET.
Sodapoppin was once a popular video game streamer, but he met his match when he became a video game himself. Now, he's stuck in a never-ending loop of being killed by players and then respawning, only to be killed again. His screams can be heard echoing through the game world, as he suffers for eternity.

name: The Courier
description: The Courier is an open world game about running a mail delivery business on a mysterious island. The more letters you deliver, the more you uncover the island's secrets.

name: Motto Pro Yakyuu Team wo Tsukurou
Catadel
description: Catadel is a colony management simulation game - with cats! Manage your cat citizens' wants, needs, and quirky personalities as you help them build a settlement in the wilderness.

name: Starlight Acres
description: Starlight Acres is a Terraforming-Farming game for iPhone and iPad. In Starlight Acres, the player has to take care of a herd of animals that find themselves on a planet they are not used to. By utilizing base building, farming, altering the environment, and genetic modification, the player must change the planet to match the animals' needs so that they can survive and reproduce. Starlight Acres is a calm and friendly resource management game based on actual Terraforming science (gamified and sped up of course).

name: Croket! 4: Bank no Mori no Shugoshin
Moero!! Pro Yakyuu: Home Run Kyousou SP
Marble Man: Marble Madness II
description: A sequel for Marble Madness. The game was cancelled before release, but there were at least 3 machines known to exist. The game was dumped and made available on the internet in 2022.

name: Lawmage Academy
description: A magic school RPG where you learn spells, craft potions, make friends, and go on exciting adventures as you uncover the dark secrets of Lawmage Academy.

name: Melodive
description:
Melodive is a unique dreamlike flight experience, built to be the most fluid and immersive 3D game on iOS. Spread your wings and feel the thrill of diving into an endless, ever-changing world of form, color and music! Your only enemy: The ground.
"... you certainly haven't seen anything like this before." Eli Cymet, Touch Arcade
"Melodive is not only one of the most original games on iOS now, it is probably one of the most original games ever, on any platform. And, one of the very best, despite its simplicity." Ian Low, Sirloin Apple

name: The Volcano
description: A kingdom, a king, a hero, and the volcano. Enter the volcano, explore it, find element guard portals, activate them, defeat element guards, collect their spell books and bring them back to your king. But be careful there isn't much light inside.

name: Hulu Has Live Sports '20: The Video Game
Raiders Run
description: Raiders Run is a Multiplayer Arena Fighting Game that takes advantage of Skill Based PVP and fun engaging combat mechanics.
